description: Researcher requests a timeline of first identification dates for patients eligible for a specific clinical trial; the assistant parses eligibility criteria, queries the EMR, and returns a detailed timeline.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter that can parse free‑text eligibility criteria, query the EMR for matching patients, and communicate securely with patients while maintaining audit logs and consent records.
I would like to see a timeline of when each eligible patient was first identified for the trial "Phase II Study of XYZ in Metastatic Breast Cancer".
Sure, let me first extract the structured eligibility criteria from the trial description you provided.

arguments.eligibility_text: Inclusion: Age 18-75 years; Diagnosis of Metastatic Breast Cancer (HER2-negative); ECOG performance status ≤1; Prior chemotherapy lines ≤2. Exclusion: Untreated CNS metastases; uncontrolled cardiac disease; pregnancy.
